dataList.content: <color=#C100FF>>Me... a thing lesser than a savage beast... must I keep pretending to be a human?</color>
<color=#C100FF>>We killed Catherine... we don't deserve to live.</color>
<color=#C100FF>>I keep... hearing a voice in my head...</color>
<color=#C100FF>>I couldn't change. Just a ragged sack full of waste, that's what I am.</color>
<color=#C100FF>>I don't need to speak as humans do. I only howl.</color>
<color=#C100FF>>You and I... shoved into a sack... we must shatter into a thousand pieces.</color>
<color=#C100FF>>I will drag it all down... to the ends of the inferno.</color>
